attributes.action: Explain how "Contrails" can be interrupted, unless trail is chemical spray.
attributes.background: Alleged secret atmospheric weaponising enabled energy beaming disintegrating steel World Trade Centre towers? Cold firemen's compressed air bottles exploded. Disappeared! 10,000 steel (fireproof)  filing cabinets & 3,000 ceramic pot toilet bowls formed in furnaces. New form of beamed energy?

rejection.details: We don't understand what action you want the UK Government or Parliament to take. We cannot accept petitions unless there is a specific action in the petition.
